description.narrative: Development of a comprehensive Curriculum Outline and content for an e-learning course on Poverty Reduction and delivery of two Capacity Development workshops

participating-org.narrative: FOOD AND AGRICULTURE ORGANIZATION OF THE UNITED NATIONS

sector.narrative: Eradicate poverty in all its forms and dimensions

provider-org.narrative: FOOD AND AGRICULTURE ORGANIZATION OF THE UNITED NATIONS

condition.narrative: UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

comment.narrative: 2. One detailed and comprehensive curriculum outline on poverty reduction, including the intertwined and contributing thematic areas, validated by a number of experts from partner institutions, including the UNDP and ITC/ILO; 3. Development of one peer-reviewed and validated lesson content for the e-learning course on poverty reduction, and preparation of materials for the joint UNDP/ITC-ILO/FAO capacity development workshops.
